info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Boone County through 700 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rule, or 8 miles southeast of Berryville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Red Bank... Capps... Alpena... Batavia... Bear Creek Springs... Gaither... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
